statements.statement: WITH t AS ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PromotionTicketNo,PromotionTicketName,TicketTotalCount,TicketAmount,DateStart,DateEnd, DateCreate,CreateUser,ActivationEndDays,CreateDepartmentNo,CreateDepartmentName,TicketDesc, AuditStatus,AuditUserId,DateAudit,PromotionPicNo,PromotionUrl, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DateCreate DESC) AS RowNum, COUNT(*) OVER() AS TotalCount FROM WfsPromotionTicket(NOLOCK) WHERE AuditStatus =2 ) a LEFT JOIN WfsOperator(nolock) b ON a.AuditUserId=b.UserName ) SELECT * FROM t ORDER By t.DateCreate DESC
